General.Name: Hainan RuiZe New Building Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Hainan RuiZe New Building Material Co.,Ltd produces and sells commercial concrete and cement in China. It provides dry-process cement, landscaping design and construction, municipal sanitation, and engineering services. The company was formerly known as Three Ya Ruize Concrete Distribution Company Limited and changed its name to Hainan RuiZe New Building Material Co.,Ltd in August 2008. Hainan RuiZe New Building Material Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Sanya, China.

2.Name: Mr. Qingchi  Yu
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
